metadata.title: Tissot Mens Seastar 1000 Chronograph 316L Stainless Steel case with Black PVD Coating Quartz Watch, Beige, Leather, 22 (T1204173605100)
features: Case Size: 45.50 mm, Band Width: 22, Case Thickness: 12.82 mm
Quartz movement, 316L stainless steel case with black PVD coating, Index dial type, Date
Water-resistant up to a pressure of 30 bar (300 m / 1000 ft): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but no diving or snorkeling.
description: The Tissot Seastar 1000 is the ultimate watersport watch, with its high water-resistance up to a pressure of 30 bar (300 m/1000 ft), screw-down crown and caseback as well as its unidirectional ceramic bezel.
